segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there drying a stupid plate while the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, ruining the cabinets and floor—how can she not see it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids! Climbing on an unstable stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's going to fall and break something, mark my words.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's encouraging him, reaching up like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be raiding the cookie jar without permission anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's too distracted to notice any of this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, water streaming down—it's infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the peaceful garden outside can't calm this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and fix this right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
